snippet: Against a traditional nemesis, the Crimson’s seven-game winning streak came to an end.
abstract: Yale defeats Harvard, 4-1, in men's college hockey game at Madison Square Garden.
lead_paragraph: Against a traditional nemesis, the Crimson’s seven-game winning streak came to an end.

headline.main: Yale Topples Harvard (Again) in Matchup at Garden
headline.print_headline: Yale Topples Harvard (Again) in Matchup at Garden
